<a id="StaticBody2D"></a>

# StaticBody2D

**Inherits:** [PhysicsBody2D](PhysicsBody2D.md) **\<** [CollisionObject2D](CollisionObject2D.md) **\<** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [AnimatableBody2D](AnimatableBody2D.md)

A 2D physics body that can't be moved by external forces. When moved manually, it doesn't affect other bodies in its path.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A static 2D physics body. It can't be moved by external forces or contacts, but can be moved manually by other means such as code, [AnimationMixer](AnimationMixer.md)\\ s (with [AnimationMixer.callback_mode_process](AnimationMixer.md#AnimationMixer_property_callback_mode_process) set to [AnimationMixer.ANIMATION_CALLBACK_MODE_PROCESS_PHYSICS](AnimationMixer.md#AnimationMixer_constant_ANIMATION_CALLBACK_MODE_PROCESS_PHYSICS)), and [RemoteTransform2D](RemoteTransform2D.md).

When **StaticBody2D** is moved, it is teleported to its new position without affecting other physics bodies in its path. If this is not desired, use [AnimatableBody2D](AnimatableBody2D.md) instead.

\ **StaticBody2D** is useful for completely static objects like floors and walls, as well as moving surfaces like conveyor belts and circular revolving platforms (by using [constant_linear_velocity](StaticBody2D.md#StaticBody2D_property_constant_linear_velocity) and [constant_angular_velocity](StaticBody2D.md#StaticBody2D_property_constant_angular_velocity)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="StaticBody2D_property_constant_angular_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **constant_angular_velocity** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#StaticBody2D_property_constant_angular_velocity)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_constant_angular_velocity**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_constant_angular_velocity**\ (\ )

The body's constant angular velocity. This does not rotate the body, but affects touching bodies, as if it were rotating.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="StaticBody2D_property_constant_linear_velocity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **constant_linear_velocity** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#StaticBody2D_property_constant_linear_velocity)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_constant_linear_velocity**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_constant_linear_velocity**\ (\ )

The body's constant linear velocity. This does not move the body, but affects touching bodies, as if it were moving.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="StaticBody2D_property_physics_material_override"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PhysicsMaterial](PhysicsMaterial.md) **physics_material_override** [ðŸ”—](#StaticBody2D_property_physics_material_override)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_physics_material_override**\ (\ value\: [PhysicsMaterial](PhysicsMaterial.md)\ )
- [PhysicsMaterial](PhysicsMaterial.md) **get_physics_material_override**\ (\ )

The physics material override for the body.

If a material is assigned to this property, it will be used instead of any other physics material, such as an inherited one.
